If you're looking for CR2450 batteries that are designed to provide reliable and long-lasting power, you're at the right place. manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Long Lasting Batteries Since 2006, Specialize in Battery 13 Years. Manufacturer of high performance alkaline batteries, Lithium cells and rechargeables. Provide reliable and long-lasting power. CR2450 Battery For long-lasting and reliable power LiCB CR2450 Lithium Coin batteries contain the substance manganese dioxide, which is chemically very stable. with high energy density and high voltage, a single 2450 Lithium Coin battery can replace two, three or more conventional batteries. If you're looking for CR2450 batteries that are designed to provide reliable and long-lasting power, you're at the right place. Fresh CR2450 Battery Have Full 3 Volts Charge 3 Years Shelf Life No mercury added High leak protection

Long shelf life Batteries have been designed to provide reliable and long lasting power. A long shelf life of up to 3 years. Reliable even in a wide range of operating temperatures (-30°C to+60°C).Wide range available on blister. Long Lasting Lots of power in an ultra-compact design.Dense and compact structure of the High Density Core. You have enough with one LiCB CR2450 battery in comparison to 2, 3 or more traditional batteries. Reliability and Safety Repeated tests on the various safety and performance characteristics of this battery have been conducted by LiCB. their high reliability and safety under the UL safety standards in the USA and wide recognition over the world. Applications No mercury added. CR2450 battery can be used for memory back-up, digital watches, car keys, laser pens, fitness appliances and medical devices such as tensiometers and clinical thermometers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These batteries are great!
reviews.reviewText: I use candles for prayer & these batteries keep the Deities honored for long periods of time. They are easy to replace these batteries. Great price for these long-lasting batteries.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They are doing the job
reviews.reviewText: I am using these in home automation sensors (temp/humidity). They wear out fast, but I think that is more of a design flaw in the sensor. The battery that they designed the sensor for has too little capacity. These were plentiful and cheap, so no big deal if I have to replace the batteries every few months, especially on the outdoor sensors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and inexpensive
reviews.reviewText: These batteries came fast well packaged and do the job

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Inexpensive & Works Great for Low-Power Items
reviews.reviewText: I use these batteries for low-power consumption remotes for LED lights and such. They last quite a long time. I'm not sure if I would trust them for a higher power consuming item or medical device but they serve their low-cost purpose for low-power devices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LiCB batteries work perfectly for car fo d
reviews.reviewText: Having a surprise to find car fibs were not responding, we ordered the batteries and were delighted, more so thank you Amazon for filling the need as soon as was possible

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great batteries. They do their job. Good quality and are also very affordable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fair price, works great!
reviews.reviewText: I work for a sizeable used car dealership. We replace A LOT of batteries in key fobs and remote starters. These batteries are great replacements for an affordable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast Delivery at a Great Price!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Works perfectly in my wife's 2012 BMW 535i Key! Bought the 10 pack so we will have many backups. These should have a 5-10 year shelf life. Because her keys are in her purse I think the buttons get pushed against other objects, thus decreasing the battery life span in her key. I told her to keep that key in a separate compartment so this wont happen. Battery installed last night worked great this morning with no more dash warnings. I'm going to put a backup battery in her glove box just in case the key dies on us while we are out and about. 10 batteries shipped and at my door the same day and cost me $11.11 is a great deal of backup safety and security. Not to mention our peace of mind. The replacement process is easy. I watched a YouTube video but just watch mine here for this style key.
